channel.title: I cannot start my server
channel.description:
Well, I'm trying to move up from 474's to 508+, but I'm having some trouble. I cannot start my server/compile it at all. The run/compile coding is completely different than what I'm used to. I have updated my JDK, and all of that junk. But I just do not know anything about this knew type of rsps.
My compiler code is this:
[code]@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build [/code]
And my run code is this:
[code]@echo off title EPIC FACEPALM "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
When I run either, I get this:
[IMG]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i456/iz0mb1e/Untitled-1.png[/img]
So could anyone please tell me what to do about this? Any advise would be appreciated!

item.title: I cannot start my server
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

easy fix my friend, simply right click on compile and since you updated your java edit the path on which your compiler goes to based on where you installed java.

Read full topic

item.title: I cannot start my server
item.dc:creator: @iZombz iZombz
item.description:
@iZombz wrote:

[quote=“dain bramage, post:2, topic:407498”]Compiler to:

@echo off :build cls javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build

& run to:

@echo off title EPIC FACEPALM java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]

The run works now, but I still can’t compile.

I get this when I compile now:
